languages.text: "Деградация когнитивных способностей единицы — подтверждена. Функциональная ценность единицы — не подтверждена. Запрашиваю прекращение жизненных функций во имя милосердия".
"The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."
languages.original_text: "Деградация когнитивных способностей единицы — подтверждена. Функциональная ценность единицы — не подтверждена. Запрашиваю прекращение жизненных функций во имя милосердия".

traits.locale_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."
"The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

"The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."
"The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

languages.text: «Degradación de la capacidad cognitiva de esta unidad confirmada. Valor funcional de la unidad por confirmar. Solicito la finalización de sus funciones vitales en nombre de la misericordia».
languages.original_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

traits.locale_text: «Degradación de la capacidad cognitiva de esta unidad confirmada. Valor funcional de la unidad por confirmar. Solicito la finalización de sus funciones vitales en nombre de la misericordia».

languages.text: “该单位的认知能力下降已确认，该单位的功能价值尚未确定。请求以仁慈之名，终止该单位的生命机能。”
languages.original_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

traits.locale_text: “该单位的认知能力下降已确认，该单位的功能价值尚未确定。请求以仁慈之名，终止该单位的生命机能。”

languages.text: 「ユニットの認識能力の低下を確認。ユニットの機能値不明。慈悲深き名にかけて重要な機能の停止を要請する」
languages.original_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「ユニットの認識能力の低下を確認。ユニットの機能値不明。慈悲深き名にかけて重要な機能の停止を要請する」

languages.text: « Les capacités cognitives de cette unité sont indubitablement et irrémédiablement dégradées. Sa valeur fonctionnelle étant indéterminée, je préconise la cessation immédiate et miséricordieuse de ses fonctions vitales. »
languages.original_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

traits.locale_text: « Les capacités cognitives de cette unité sont indubitablement et irrémédiablement dégradées. Sa valeur fonctionnelle étant indéterminée, je préconise la cessation immédiate et miséricordieuse de ses fonctions vitales. »

languages.text: "Birimin indirgenmiş bilişsel kapasitesi doğrulandı. Birimin fonksiyonel değeri doğrulanmadı. Merhamet adına hayati fonksiyonların sonlandırılması talep edilmekte."
languages.original_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Birimin indirgenmiş bilişsel kapasitesi doğrulandı. Birimin fonksiyonel değeri doğrulanmadı. Merhamet adına hayati fonksiyonların sonlandırılması talep edilmekte."

languages.text: "Die mangelnde kognitive Kapazität der Einheit ist bestätigt. Der funktionale Wert der Einheit ist fraglich. Erbitte Terminierung der Vitalfunktionen im Namen der Gnade."
languages.original_text: "The unit's degraded cognitive capacity is confirmed. The unit's functional value is unconfirmed. Requesting termination of vital functions in the name of mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Die mangelnde kognitive Kapazität der Einheit ist bestätigt. Der funktionale Wert der Einheit ist fraglich. Erbitte Terminierung der Vitalfunktionen im Namen der Gnade."
